channel.title: More Help LmAo
channel.description:
OK this is nooby aswell but, im trying to add a sendMessage to a bank command, and im trying to make it say:
[b]Hey there "playername" this is your bank![/b]
OK, so i think the line should be like this:
[b]sendMessage("Hey there +playerName+ this is your bank!");[/b]
And i compiled>Succesful>Run Server>::bank>Hey there +playerName+ this is your bank!. I know the statement is correct but the playerName is wrong, how do i add it? :o
[b][i][u]Thanks again... yes i know im a noob at this, atleast im trying.

item.title: More Help LmAo
item.dc:creator: @M00_M00_Pk M00 M00 Pk
item.description:
@M00_M00_Pk wrote:

Aaaah. I knew it had something to do with + And " But i didnt know so i tried each one, but not both together…

IM learning fast so i wont have all these pointless nooby questions… -.-

Read full topic

item.title: More Help LmAo
item.dc:creator: @xx_nub_xx xx nub xx
item.description:
@xx_nub_xx wrote:

[quote=“M00 M00 Pk, post:1, topic:170490”]OK this is nooby aswell but, im trying to add a sendMessage to a bank command, and im trying to make it say:

Hey there “playername” this is your bank!

OK, so i think the line should be like this:

sendMessage(“Hey there +playerName+ this is your bank!”);

And i compiled>Succesful>Run Server>::bank>Hey there +playerName+ this is your bank!.
I know the statement is correct but the playerName is wrong, how do i add it? :o

[b][i][u]Thanks again… yes i know im a noob at this, atleast im trying.[/quote]

sendMessage("Hey there "+playerName+" this is your bank!");

replace it with that

Read full topic
